item.title: Report E-2024040109
item.description:
Report E-2024040109

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-09T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-13
  • City: SAVANNAH
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that due to the product being impacted by other freight, approximately .5 teaspoon of Tufcote 3.3 PR High Solids Fast Dry Alkyd Primer - White (hazardous - UN1263) was released. The caller stated that the released product was contained to the pallet and did not impact the trailer floor. The released product and 2 damaged cans were placed into a 30-gallon poly drum and staged in OS&D. There were no drains soils or waterways reported to have been impacted by the release.
